channel.title: CVE Feed for Ex-Themes -- WP Timeline – Vertical and Horizontal timeline plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ex-Themes -- WP Timeline – Vertical and Horizontal timeline plugin

item.title: CVE-2024-47324|2024-10-05T12:33:06.952Z -- ex-themes -- wp%20timeline%20%E2%80%93%20vertical%20and%20horizontal%20timeline%20plugin
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Ex-Themes WP Timeline – Vertical and Horizontal timeline plugin allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects WP Timeline – Vertical and Horizontal timeline plugin: from n/a through 3.6.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-47323|2024-10-05T12:31:50.181Z -- ex-themes -- wp%20timeline%20%E2%80%93%20vertical%20and%20horizontal%20timeline%20plugin
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Ex-Themes WP Timeline – Vertical and Horizontal timeline plugin allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects WP Timeline – Vertical and Horizontal timeline plugin: from n/a through 3.6.7.
